ratings.comment: At the start of ESL 118, I was almost certain that I would fail the class, but as I progressed I found out that Renee was extremely available for emails with questions (even on Sunday nights!), and always seemed to care for her students. With enough time commitment and enough communication with Renee, you too should be able to get an A!

she is a terrible teacher. At first, you will find wow she is a great person. But gradually you will feel the class is extremely boring. Such a boring class requires participation is really annoying. She is also a very tough grader. You will get a very low score in your summary believe me. So do not take her class, neither helpful nor useful.
She was very nice! However, ESL 118 still need huge effort.

Renee is always willing to help you refine your paper. She gives you good feedback and offers more As than other 118 instructors. I will definitely recommend my friends to take her class. You will learn things while getting a decent grade.

The instructor was fine but this class is awful and does not help at all. All the materials and skills needed for writing are all basically covered very well in 117 courses. This class requires three papers with two themed one, just like what you did in 117 course, and one IRP which is a nightmare.
Had a lovely class! She is very friendly and tries her best to develop your writing skills.

Renee is the best teacher I met in college so far. Her class was interesting and lively, and she gave really specific feedback and reasonable grades on my papers. She showed her enthusiasm in teaching. She brought flowers from her backyard to the class, made brownie for us, and recommended good chocolate shops to us, making the class enjoyable.

Nice teacher!! The course is really time-consuming, but she is really nice: gives a lot of good suggestions on how to improve your paper. Grading is a little strict, but if your work hard you can definitely get a decent score. Just don't expect to do nothing and get an A - that's impossible!

Professor Lajcak is awesome, one of the best I've ever had. She is always there to help you. Expect a lot of homework, but that's because of the course material. The course is hard, but the professor makes it much much much better!
